bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: Semantic Role Labeling Demo only provide v2 trainer, but not provide model inference code.
bug.description: Related issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/issues/1785>#1785</denchmark-link> . The paddle <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/tree/develop/demo/semantic_role_labeling>srl demo</denchmark-link> only provide v2 API trainer, which is . The is not related to this trainer, and the , cannot be used due to missing files.

comments.comment: qingqing has fixed this in this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/book/pull/273/files>pr</denchmark-link> . I will merge it into demo later.
Hi, i tried the latest build . Seems the fixes has not been updated yet. Please help to make the inference script run. Many thanks!
